あ.Definition: afterwards, since then, in the future
to be [存在], to have [所有]

い.Definition: five days, the fifth day (of the month)

お.Definition: to alight (eg from bus), to get off

か.Definition: to borrow, to have a loan

き.Definition: to hear, to listen, to ask
to wear, to put on (from shoulders down)

く.Definition: (with te-form verb) please do for me
to become cloudy, to become dim

け.Definition: to erase, to delete, to turn off power

こ.Definition: nine days, the ninth day (of the month)
to be worried, to be bothered

さ.Definition: to raise (stretch out) hands, to raise (eg umbrella)
to walk or to go for a stroll

す.Definition: to smoke, to breathe in, to suck

つ.Definition: for one day, first of month

と.Definition: ten days, the tenth (day of the month)

な.Definition: seven days, the seventh day (of the month)
to line up, to stand in a line
to line up, to set up

ね.Definition: to go to bed, to sleep

の.Definition: to get on, to ride in, to board

は.Definition: to enter, to contain, to hold
twenty days, twentieth (day of the month)

ふ.Definition: second day of the month, two days

み.Definition: three days, the third day (of the month)

も.Definition: (1) to hold, to carry, (2) to possess

や.Definition: to rest, to have a break, to take a day off

よ.Definition: eight days, the eighth (day of the month)

わ.Definition: to pass over, to hand over
to cross over, to go across
